author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Jessica Alba shows off sexy body in Cabo
text:
They must have hit the gym before they headed out on vacation.
Jessica Alba and her husband, Cash Warren, showed off their sexy beach bodies in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico on Monday.
Neither Jessica, 35, or Cash, 38, were shy about putting their toned tummies on display in the luxury destination.
Hot! Jessica Alba showed off her sexy beach bodies in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico on Monday
Work it: The stunner wore a black bikini and blue-and-white cover up
The Mechanic: Resurrection star spent much of her time soaking up the sun while laying on her stomach, with her perky rear end in plain view.
She had on a black bandeau bikini top with black and white printed bottoms that hugged the curves of her backside.
When she did want to cover up a bit, she had a lightweight, blue and white printed duster easily within reach.
Quality time: Both Honor Marie, 8, and Haven Garner, 5, were nowhere to be seen as the pair chatted and laughed on wooden chaise lounges
Hot hubby: Her executive producer husband Cash Warren also brought his A-game as the couple took some time for themselves
Stripping down: Starting out in a baseball cap and dress shirt with sleeves rolled up to his elbows, the 30 for 30 producer later revealed what he had going on underneath it all
Going for a walk? The movie star put on a cover up as she strolled past the loungers
Sexy stars: Neither Jessica, 35, or Cash, 38, were shy about putting their toned tummies on display in the luxury destination
Her executive producer husband also brought his A-game as the couple took some time for themselves.
Starting out in a baseball cap and dress shirt with sleeves rolled up to his elbows, the 30 for 30 producer later revealed what he had going on underneath it all.
Cash stripped down to just his blue swimming trunks as he let his tattoo on his upper arm see the light of day and exposed his sculpted pectoral and abdominal muscles for all to see.
The perks: The Mechanic: Resurrection star spent much of her time soaking up the sun while laying on her stomach, with her perky rear end in plain view
Teeny bikini: She had on a black bandeau bikini top with black and white printed bottoms that hugged the curves of her backside
Keeping cool: They relaxed side by side and made the most of their quality time with iced beverages on hand to stay cool on the sunny day
The couple, who were married in 2008, enjoyed their adult time without their children in the little slice of paradise.
Both Honor Marie, 8, and Haven Garner, 5, were nowhere to be seen as the pair chatted and laughed on wooden chaise lounges.
They relaxed side by side and made the most of their quality time with iced beverages on hand to stay cool on the sunny day.
Grownup time: The couple, who were married in 2008, enjoyed their adult time without their children in the little slice of paradise
